mapper.update: update pf_border_operation_log set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pf_border_id = #{pfBorderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pf_border_status = #{pfBorderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, create_man, pf_border_id, pf_border_status, remark from pf_border_operation_log
